title: Adrianne Pieczonka
blurb: I worked with internationally-celebrated soprano Adrianne Pieczonka to create a bold, modern design to showcase her performances.

alt: Portrait of Canadian tenor Adam Luther
title: Adam Luther
blurb: Adam was ready for an updated website. We created a stark, modern look that reflects the drama of this opera singer's live performances.

alt: Portrait of Canadian soprano Laura Albino
title: Laura Albino
blurb: Laura is an opera singer who wanted a new website to accompany her European audition tour. Together, we created a fresh, vibrant design to highlight her portfolio.

alt: A composite photo showing headshots of twelve Coffeeshop Creative clients
title: Coffeeshop Creative
blurb: I've also partnered with designer Stephen Bell of Coffeeshop Creative to build sites for John Greer, Riccardo Iannello, Hit & Run Dance Productions, Alon Nashman, Theaturtle, Extension Method, DG Volo & Company, WSB Massage, Stephanie Tritchew and Kristina Agur.
